overview: Music legend Lou Ragland and Hot Chocolate graced the stage at The Beachland Ballroom in Cleveland, Ohio in August 2012. Lou and his band mates performed a 13 track set full of Lou's legendary songs from "I Travel Alone", "Good for the Gander", "Rhythm is a Thing" and a collaboration with The Hesitations on "Understand Each Other.
title: Lou Ragland & Hot Chocolate - Live
